name: Toggle
description: Toggle component (Switch) for boolean input. Represents an on/off state. Extends MUI Switch with custom styling.

props.name: checked
props.description: If true, the toggle is on

props.name: disabled
props.description: If true, the toggle is disabled

props.name: onChange
props.description: Callback fired when the state changes

examples.title: With Label

migrationExamples.description: Replace MUI Switch with Toggle component
